eventParking: Replicated will be our lovely hosts for this event and they are located at 5913 Blackwelder Street, Culver City, CA 90232. There will be ample parking outside the building.

sponsors.name: Replicated
sponsors.description: Replicated gives SaaS vendors a container-based platform for easily deploying their cloud-native applications inside customers' environments. Because security and control still matter.

sponsors.name: js.la
sponsors.description: js.la is the premier javascript enthusiast meetup in Los Angeles. Meeting the last Thursday of the month js.la invites the best and brightest in the JavaScript community to present their experiences working with JavaScript and related internet technologies.
